resources.string: Pamper yourself at Iyke\'s salon where talent meets creativity. Despite Iyke\'s salon\'s new classy chic decor, you won\'t find any pretentiousness here. Clients can enjoy a warm and inviting environment with perks such as an aroma scalp massage before shampoos, tea, coffee, beer or a glass of wine to unwind.
Complimentary Wifi and tablet use available

It is imperative for our staff to keep our clients\' hair looking healthy and strong. We offer an array of specialty treatments for your hair and scalp as well as an ammonia-free colour line which keeps your hair in \"virgin-like\" condition.
